meta.description: Optimize the number of trips for transporting candles using freight and air.

sets.name: MODES
sets.description: Transportation modes available for moving candles.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity in tons per trip for each transportation mode.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per trip for each transportation mode.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips scheduled for each transportation mode.

objective.name: min_total_trips
objective.description: Minimize the total number of trips.

constraints.name: total_tons_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 200 tons of candles are transported.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure the total cost does not exceed the budget of $20000.

constraints.name: air_transport_requirement
constraints.description: At least 30% of the total tons must be transported by air.

constraints.name: minimum_freight_trips
constraints.description: At least 5 trips must be made using freight.
